title: lac operon requirements with 5 answer options

content.question: Maximal transcription of the lac operon requires

choices.label: the presence of high levels of glucose

the removal of the operator region of the
 operon
the presence of cyclic AMP and lactose
the activation of the repressor protein

the presence of cyclin and cyclin-dependent
 kinase

content.answer: the presence of cyclic AMP and lactose
